page.title: 08ROSKEAR SCHOOL CAMBORNE
page.content: {Roskear school}is situated on the outskirts of Camborne town centre. It was opened on{26/7/1876}& its main building still stands. The school has 17 teachers,including the headmistress, &{342 pupils}from 3\ to 11+. The school has an optional uniform of blue & grey.Roskear has many after school clubs including;computers, athletics, soccer, rugby & cricket & lunchtime clubs including country dancing & aerobics. School begins at 9am. The infants finish at 3.15pm & the juniors at 3.30pm.Roskear has some facilities including a disused swimming pool, a hard playground & a small school garden. The pupils have full examinations in june every year & reports following them.
